resources.string:
EZ Time Tracker Version $versionName$

About

EZ Time Tracker is an Android app to record time spend on user definable activities/categories.

It records the time between "punch in" and "punch out" even if the app is not running.

There are reports for details or totals by day, week, month and/or category that can be viewed or exported to textfile/email.

Raw data can be exported to csv file on sd-card.

Android Llama + EZ Time Tracker = location based timetracking: i.e. aoutmatic recording when entering/leaving job/buro.

History

EZ Time Tracker up to Version 1.6 was developed in 2010 by Eric Z,
the sources are hosted in svn repository@googlecode.com.

Since 2012 EZ Time Tracker is developed by k3b,
the sources are hosted in git repository@github.com.

Recent Improvements
  • A remote brodcast api allow other android apps to trigger EZ Time Tracker events.
    This way Android Llama can be used to do Location based time tracking: Recording when entering/leaving job/buro.
  • German/English localisations,
    Support for culture specific Date/Time formats
  • Improved CSV export
  • Date/Time entry with new Dateslider.
  • sqLite Database can be made public so that other android apps like aSQLiteManager can access it.

Links

  • Source code in svn repository@googlecode.com of original EZ Time Tracker Version 1.6
    http://eztimetracker.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
  • Eric Z-s Homepage of EZ Time Tracker
    http://zettsetttech.blogspot.com/
  • source code of current version of EZ Time Tracker in git repository@github.com
    https://github.com/k3b/EzTimeTracker
  • Homepage of new EzTimeTracker
    https://github.com/k3b/EzTimeTracker/wiki
  • Dateslider for Android
    http://code.google.com/p/android-dateslider/
  • Licence for Ez Time Tracker and Dateslider
    Apache License, Version 2.0.
    http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
  • Kebab-s android app Llama can be used to create location based event that can trigger EZ Time Tracker punch in/out
    http://kebabapps.blogspot.com/search/label/Llama
  • aSQLiteManager a generic database app that can be used to access EZ Time Tracker database
    http://aaa.andsen.dk/aSQLiteManager.html
